com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.core

Class ReusableSocket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.adobe.aem.init.dogmatix.core.ReusableSocket

  • public class ReusableSocket
extends Object
    A re-usable socket implementation. Wraps a java.net.Socket instance adding on additional behaviour to it. Maintains the access count, last access timestamp, persistability of the underlying Socket. A re-usable socket is used for implementing keep-alive behaviour i.e. persistent TCP connections
    Author:
    vnagpal
